items.sentence: Theoretical physics was child's play to Einstein, but he couldn't figure out his income tax.
Mary traveled into the future and found that climate change had destroyed all life on Earth.
I'd rather live in a world full of secrets than one so small that I'm able to understand it.
Tom has been going out with Mary ever since they met at a fourth of July picnic last summer.
The reason Mary has to go to the bathroom so often is that she drinks ten cups of tea a day.
